body_html:
if we want to avoid this zeroing for cublas, we can add a guard around these zero calls rather than remove them.
the guard will be i think:

#if !IS_CUDA
THTensor_(zero)(LIBRARY_STATE ((THPTensor*)$arg0)->cdata);
#endif
body_text:
if we want to avoid this zeroing for cublas, we can add a guard around these zero calls rather than remove them.
the guard will be i think:
#if !IS_CUDA
THTensor_(zero)(LIBRARY_STATE ((THPTensor*)$arg0)->cdata);
#endif
body:
if we want to avoid this zeroing for cublas, we can add a guard around these zero calls rather than remove them.
the guard will be i think:
```
#if !IS_CUDA
THTensor_(zero)(LIBRARY_STATE ((THPTensor*)$arg0)->cdata);
#endif
```
